meanings.definition: Behavior showing great courage and bravery.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter's heroism saved the family from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: Many stories of heroism emerged from the war, inspiring others to be brave.
meanings.sent3: His heroism in rescuing the cat stuck in the tree made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The heroism of the marathon runners battling through the rain was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The heroism of the young boy who stood up to the bully will never be forgotten.

meanings.definition: The qualities or attributes of a hero.
meanings.sent1: She admired the heroism of her favorite comic book character.
meanings.sent2: The heroism of the main character in the movie inspired the audience.
meanings.sent3: His heroism in always standing up for what is right earned him many friends.
meanings.sent4: The heroism of the knight in shining armor was a symbol of hope for the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The heroism of the teacher who went above and beyond for her students was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a hero.
meanings.sent1: The heroism of the soldier was recognized with a medal of honor.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, people often rise to heroism to help others in need.
meanings.sent3: His heroism in the face of danger was truly inspiring to all who witnessed it.
meanings.sent4: The heroism of the leader during the natural disaster brought the community together.
meanings.sent5: The heroism of the lifeguard who saved the drowning child was captured on video.
